title: Amber Gill says she's 'screaming' as her Love Island exes Mike and Greg hang out together

Amber Gill had an extremely dramatic reaction to her Love Island exes Michael Griffiths and Greg O'Shea hanging out together.

She tweeted to exclaim: "I'm screaming" as Greg, who she won the show with, posted a video of Mike watching him play rugby.

The video was originally posted on Mike's Instagram , and it shows him sitting with former cast mate Jordan Hames preparing to watch professional player Greg.

Another shot shows Greg on the pitch as Mike films him excitedly, cheering him on during the match.

(Image: David Fisher/REX)

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

Amber posted the tweet at the same time those videos went up - and we understand her baffled reaction.

Greg and Mike weren't exactly pals in the villa, as when Mike messed things up with Amber by having his head turned by Joanna Chimonides, Amber ended up coupling up with Greg instead.

Mike then tried to win Amber back, to no avail, and the two shared some pretty explosive arguments.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Amber and Greg became official boyfriend and girlfriend, but didn't last long outside the villa.

It was revealed he dumped Amber by text after just weeks on the outside.

Amber had made her feelings known to Greg as she told him she loved him and she even mused on the idea of moving to his hometown in Ireland.

(Image: REX)

(Image: ITV)

However, the Love Island hunk said their relationship simply didn't work because of the distance.

Love rivals Michael and Greg barely spoke in the villa - so it's a big shock to see them hanging out.

Wonder if Amber's ears were burning?
description: Amber Gill's exes and former love rivals Mike and Greg have been hanging out at a rugby match - and Amber is horrified
